title: Sidewall, 1900–20
creditline: Gift of Arlene M. and Thomas C. Ellis
description: Repeating pattern featuring bouquet of flowers set within diaper framework.The diaper motif is composed of laurel leaves, with each grid connected to the next grid by a wreath. Printed in soft yellow on mustard-yellow flock ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1900–20.
1900–20. Flocked. Gift of Arlene M. and Thomas C. Ellis. 1981-65-37.
